items.sentence: Tom kept on smoking, even though we asked him not to.
Tom didn\'t need to take a taxi. He could\'ve walked.
Did you have any trouble convincing Tom to help Mary?
Did you hear about what happened here this afternoon?
Did you really expect me to give you that much money?
Tom didn't know whether Mary was still asleep or not.
My father will return at the beginning of next month.
One drop of this poison is enough to kill 160 people.
That isn't the main reason why Tom wanted to do that.
I plan to stay until Monday, no matter what Tom says.
